name: Azaia Mindprobe
abilities: [{"description":"Equipped Creature cannot be targeted by Mugic or abilities played by Creatures with lower Wisdom than it. This Battlegear begins the game face up.","effectType":"protection","battleRules":{"type":"prevent_targeting_by_lower_stat","notes":"Impede ser alvo de Mugic/habilidades de criaturas com Sabedoria menor.","payload":{"stat":"wisdom","starts_face_up":true}},"targetScope":"self"}]

name: Ankh of Kehn-Sep
abilities: [{"description":"Equipped Creature deals an additional 5 attack damage to Creatures with no Elemental Types.","effectType":"damage_modifier","battleRules":{"type":"additional_damage_to_no_element_creatures","notes":"Causa 5 de dano de ataque adicional a criaturas sem tipo elemental.","payload":{"amount":5}},"targetScope":"self"}]

name: Aquatic Familiar
abilities: [{"description":"Equipped Creature has 'Expend Water: Gain 50 Wisdom'.","effectType":"stat_modifier","battleRules":{"type":"expend_element_for_stat","notes":"Ganha 50 de Sabedoria ao gastar o elemento Água.","payload":{"element":"water","stat":"wisdom","amount":50}},"targetScope":"self"}]

name: Bi-Mowercycle
abilities: [{"description":"Equipped Creature has 'Range' and 'Swift 1'.","effectType":"gain_keyword","battleRules":{"type":"gain_keywords","notes":"Ganha Range e Swift 1.","payload":{"keywords":["range","swift 1"]}},"targetScope":"self"},{"description":"Sacrifice Bi-Mowercycle: Target Creature gains 'Range' and 'Swift 1'.","effectType":"gain_keyword","battleRules":{"type":"sacrifice_to_grant_keywords","notes":"Sacrifica para dar Range e Swift 1 a um alvo.","payload":{"keywords":["range","swift 1"]}},"targetScope":"target_creature"},{"description":"This Battlegear begins the game face up.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"starts_face_up","notes":"Começa o jogo virado para cima.","payload":{}},"targetScope":"self"}]

name: Citadel Fragments
abilities: [{"description":"Equipped Creature has an additional 5 Energy and 5 in each Discipline for each Elemental Type it has.","effectType":"stat_modifier","battleRules":{"type":"gain_stats_per_element","notes":"Ganha 5 de Energia e 5 em cada disciplina por tipo elemental.","payload":{"energy_per_element":5,"discipline_per_element":5}},"targetScope":"self"}]

name: Chadel Lodestone
abilities: [{"description":"When equipped Creature becomes engaged, it gains Earth.","effectType":"gain_element","battleRules":{"type":"gain_element_on_engage","notes":"Ganha Terra ao se tornar engajado.","payload":{"element":"earth"}},"targetScope":"self"}]

name: Colestone
abilities: [{"description":"When a Creature engaged with the equipped Creature fails a Discipline check on an attack it played, the equipped Creature gains 10 Energy.","effectType":"gain_energy","battleRules":{"type":"gain_energy_on_opponent_fail_check","notes":"Ganha 10 de energia quando o oponente engajado falha em um teste de disciplina.","payload":{"amount":10}},"targetScope":"self"}]

name: Double Cloak
abilities: [{"description":"At the beginning of combat, choose 'Fire 5', 'Air 5', 'Earth 5' or 'Water 5'. Equipped Creature gains the chosen ability and 'Recklessness 5'.","effectType":"gain_keyword","battleRules":{"type":"choose_elemental_keyword_and_gain_recklessness","notes":"Escolhe uma habilidade elemental e ganha Recklessness 5 no início do combate.","payload":{"recklessness_amount":5}},"targetScope":"self"}]

name: Drill Rig
abilities: [{"description":"Equipped Creature has an additional 10 Energy. If equipped Creature has Earth, it has an additional 10 Energy.","effectType":"gain_energy","battleRules":{"type":"gain_energy_with_element_bonus","notes":"Ganha 10 de energia, e mais 10 se tiver Terra.","payload":{"base_amount":10,"bonus_amount":10,"element":"earth"}},"targetScope":"self"}]

name: Flameblade of Seeryn
abilities: [{"description":"Whenever equipped Creature deals 30 or more Fire damage with a single attack, destroy target Battlegear.","effectType":"destroy","battleRules":{"type":"destroy_battlegear_on_damage_threshold","notes":"Destrói um Battlegear alvo ao causar 30 ou mais de dano de Fogo.","payload":{"damage_threshold":30,"element":"fire"}},"targetScope":"target_battlegear"}]

name: Hyperhover
abilities: [{"description":"Equipped Creature has 'Untargetable' if it has moved this turn.","effectType":"gain_keyword","battleRules":{"type":"gain_keyword_if_moved","notes":"Ganha 'Untargetable' se a criatura se moveu no turno.","payload":{"keyword":"untargetable"}},"targetScope":"self"}]

name: Kha'rall Shard of the Staunch
abilities: [{"description":"Equipped Creature has Water. Equipped Kha'rall has an additional 15 Energy and 'Defender: Water'. This Battlegear begins the game face up.","effectType":"stat_modifier","battleRules":{"type":"gain_element_and_bonus_for_specific_creature","notes":"Dá Água. Se for um Kha'rall, dá +15 de Energia e Defender: Water.","payload":{"element":"water","creature_name":"kha'rall","bonus_energy":15,"bonus_keyword":"defender: water","starts_face_up":true}},"targetScope":"self"}]

name: Metabolic Overloader
abilities: [{"description":"Equipped Creature has 'Expend Fire: Gain 50 Power'.","effectType":"stat_modifier","battleRules":{"type":"expend_element_for_stat","notes":"Ganha 50 de Poder ao gastar o elemento Fogo.","payload":{"element":"fire","stat":"power","amount":50}},"targetScope":"self"}]

name: Mysterious Clawblade
abilities: [{"description":"Equipped Creature has 'Expend Air: Gain 50 Speed'.","effectType":"stat_modifier","battleRules":{"type":"expend_element_for_stat","notes":"Ganha 50 de Velocidade ao gastar o elemento Ar.","payload":{"element":"air","stat":"speed","amount":50}},"targetScope":"self"}]

name: Orb of Unda
abilities: [{"description":"Sacrifice Orb of Unda: Put a Mugic counter on equipped Creature. If equipped Creature has Water, heal 10 damage from it.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"sacrifice_for_mugic_and_heal","notes":"Sacrifica para dar um contador de Mugic e curar 10 se tiver Água.","payload":{"heal_amount":10,"element":"water"}},"targetScope":"self"}]

name: Orchis Undin
abilities: [{"description":"When equipped Creature becomes engaged, it gains Water.","effectType":"gain_element","battleRules":{"type":"gain_element_on_engage","notes":"Ganha Água ao se tornar engajado.","payload":{"element":"water"}},"targetScope":"self"}]

name: Phoenix Belt
abilities: [{"description":"Sacrifice Phoenix Belt: Deal 10 damage to target Creature. If equipped Creature has Fire, deal an additional 10 damage.","effectType":"damage","battleRules":{"type":"sacrifice_for_damage_with_bonus","notes":"Sacrifica para causar 10 de dano, mais 10 se tiver Fogo.","payload":{"base_amount":10,"bonus_amount":10,"element":"fire"}},"targetScope":"target_creature"}]

name: Phasing Transporter
abilities: [{"description":"At the beginning of each turn, equipped Creature must swap places with another Creature you control. This Battlegear begins the game face up.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"forced_swap_at_turn_start","notes":"Força a troca de lugar com outra criatura no início do turno.","payload":{"starts_face_up":true}},"targetScope":"self"}]

name: Guranium Pendant
abilities: [{"description":"Equipped Creature has 'Expend Earth: Gain 50 Courage'.","effectType":"stat_modifier","battleRules":{"type":"expend_element_for_stat","notes":"Ganha 50 de Coragem ao gastar o elemento Terra.","payload":{"element":"earth","stat":"courage","amount":50}},"targetScope":"self"}]

name: Sandstorm Shroud
abilities: [{"description":"When equipped Creature becomes engaged, it gains Air.","effectType":"gain_element","battleRules":{"type":"gain_element_on_engage","notes":"Ganha Ar ao se tornar engajado.","payload":{"element":"air"}},"targetScope":"self"}]

name: Scarab of Khilai
abilities: [{"description":"Equipped Creature and Creatures engaged with it cannot lose Elemental Types.","effectType":"protection","battleRules":{"type":"prevent_elemental_loss_for_engaged","notes":"Impede a perda de tipos elementais para a criatura equipada e as engajadas com ela.","payload":{}},"targetScope":"self_and_engaged"}]

name: Skopolon
abilities: [{"description":"At the start of the turn you may look at target face-down Battlegear you do not control. (The Battlegear remains face down). This Battlegear begins the game face up.","effectType":"scry","battleRules":{"type":"look_at_opponent_battlegear","notes":"Permite olhar um Battlegear virado para baixo do oponente no início do turno.","payload":{"starts_face_up":true}},"targetScope":"opponent_battlegear"}]

name: Stormbird Statue
abilities: [{"description":"Equipped Creature has 'Swift 1'. If equipped Creature has Air, it has 'Surprise'. This Battlegear begins the game face up.","effectType":"gain_keyword","battleRules":{"type":"gain_keyword_with_element_bonus","notes":"Ganha Swift 1, e Surprise se tiver Ar.","payload":{"base_keyword":"swift 1","bonus_keyword":"surprise","element":"air","starts_face_up":true}},"targetScope":"self"}]

name: Sun Chariot of Kehn-Sep
abilities: [{"description":"When equipped Creature becomes engaged, it gains Fire.","effectType":"gain_element","battleRules":{"type":"gain_element_on_engage","notes":"Ganha Fogo ao se tornar engajado.","payload":{"element":"fire"}},"targetScope":"self"}]

name: Trident of Treachery
abilities: [{"description":"If equipped Creature would deal 20 or more Fire attack damage it may deal 10 damage to target Creature instead.","effectType":"damage_modifier","battleRules":{"type":"redirect_damage_option","notes":"Se causaria 20+ de dano de Fogo, pode causar 10 a um alvo em vez disso.","payload":{"damage_threshold":20,"element":"fire","redirect_damage":10}},"targetScope":"self"}]

name: Ulmanator
abilities: [{"description":"Creatures engaged with equipped Creature lose 10 to all Disciplines for each Elemental Type they have.","effectType":"stat_modifier","battleRules":{"type":"reduce_opponent_stats_per_element","notes":"Reduz as disciplinas do oponente engajado em 10 por tipo elemental.","payload":{"amount_per_element":-10}},"targetScope":"engaged_creatures"}]

name: Varanos
abilities: [{"description":"Equipped Creature has 'Range' and 'Swift 1' for each Creature in your discard pile. This Battlegear begins the game face up.","effectType":"gain_keyword","battleRules":{"type":"gain_keywords_per_creature_in_discard","notes":"Ganha Range e Swift 1 por criatura no descarte.","payload":{"keywords":["range","swift 1"],"starts_face_up":true}},"targetScope":"self"}]

name: Vlaric Shard
abilities: [{"description":"Equipped Creature with Earth deals an additional 5 attack damage.","effectType":"damage_modifier","battleRules":{"type":"additional_damage_if_has_element","notes":"Causa 5 de dano de ataque adicional se tiver Terra.","payload":{"amount":5,"element":"earth"}},"targetScope":"self"},{"description":"When you shuffle your Attack Deck destroy Vlaric Shard.","effectType":"destroy","battleRules":{"type":"destroy_on_shuffle","notes":"É destruído quando você embaralha seu deck de ataque.","payload":{}},"targetScope":"self"}]

name: Xerium Armor
abilities: [{"description":"If equipped Creature would take more than 20 damage from an attack, it takes 20 damage instead. Unique.","effectType":"protection","battleRules":{"type":"damage_cap","notes":"Limita o dano recebido de um ataque a 20. Único.","payload":{"cap_amount":20,"is_unique":true}},"targetScope":"self"}]
